title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples to score the response.

The first point is earned with a connection to the correct part of the piecewise defined function. ∫ 0 2 C ( t )  dt MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaWdXaqaaiaadoeacaaMi8 +aaeWaaeaacaWG0baacaGLOaGaayzkaaGaaGPaVlaaykW7caWGKbGa amiDaaWcbaGaaGimaaqaaiaaikdaa0Gaey4kIipaaaa@40A6@ by itself is not sufficient to earn the point.

The second point is earned with − 1 2 e 4− t 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacqGHsisldaWcaaqaaiaaig daaeaacaaIYaaaaiaadwgadaahaaWcbeqaaiaaisdacqGHsislcaWG 0bWaaWbaaWqabeaacaaIYaaaaaaaaaa@3A4D@ or with − 1 2 e u MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacqGHsisldaWcaaqaaiaaig daaeaacaaIYaaaaiaadwgadaahaaWcbeqaaiaadwhaaaaaaa@37B9@ for u=4− t 2 . MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWG1bGaeyypa0JaaGinai abgkHiTiaadshadaahaaWcbeqaaiaaikdaaaGccaGGUaaaaa@397D@ Limits of integration are part of the third point.

The third point does not require units.
descriptions: The student response does not accurately include any of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes one of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes two of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes all three of the criteria below.

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.

The first point is earned by showing both C ( 3 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWGdbGaaGjcVpaabmaaba GaaG4maaGaayjkaiaawMcaaaaa@37D3@ and C ′  ( 3 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaceWGdbGbauaacaaMi8+aae WaaeaacaaIZaaacaGLOaGaayzkaaaaaa@37DF@ are less than zero or that both have the same sign.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.

The second point is earned with the justification that B MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWGcbaaaa@33FB@ is continuous and a numerical difference quotient equal to 2.5. MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaaIYaGaaiOlaiaaiwdaca GGUaaaaa@3613@ There is no requirement for the response to indicate that B MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWGcbaaaa@33FB@ is differentiable, nor to refer to the Mean Value Theorem by name.

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples to score the response.

The first point is earned by comparing B MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWGcbaaaa@33FB@ and C, MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWGdbGaaiilaaaa@34AC@ either by a subtraction statement or by comparing B ( t ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWGcbGaaGjcVpaabmaaba GaamiDaaGaayjkaiaawMcaaaaa@380E@ and C ( t ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWGdbGaaGjcVpaabmaaba GaamiDaaGaayjkaiaawMcaaaaa@380F@ for some t MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWG0baaaa@342D@ in { 0,  1,  2 }. MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaGadaqaaiaaicdacaGGSa GaaGPaVlaaykW7caaIXaGaaiilaiaaykW7caaMc8UaaGOmaaGaay5E aiaaw2haaiaac6caaaa@3FD4@

The second point is earned with a justification that includes asserting the continuity of B MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWGcbaaaa@33FB@ and C MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWGdbaaaa@33FC@ or of B−C, MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWGcbGaeyOeI0Iaam4qai aacYcaaaa@3660@ and showing that B ( 0 )>C ( 0 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWGcbGaaGjcVpaabmaaba GaaGimaaGaayjkaiaawMcaaiabg6da+iaadoeacaaMi8+aaeWaaeaa caaIWaaacaGLOaGaayzkaaaaaa@3D73@ and B ( 2 )<C ( 2 ).
